DOC.brief_summary: Patients with hypertrophic cardiomyopathy are being compared to a control group. IMR will be assessed with a pressure wire. Clinical f/u at 3 months and 6 months and a 48 hour holter monitor.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Microvascular Dysfunction in Symptomatic Patients With HypertroPhic CaRdiomyopathy
DOC.criteria: Age 1880 Already have an indication for coronary angiography Previous diagnosis of hypertrophic cardiomyopathy (unless control) Fractional flow reserve found to be significant (FFR < 0.8) Already have a condition associated with or likely to be associated with an elevated IMR (diabetes, cardiac syndrome X, takotsubo cardiomyopathy, hypertensive cardiomyopathy, severe aortic stenosis, STEMI)
